Class LayoutFileOperations

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to handle model and layout file operations.

    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public static CompositeEntity open(HomerMainFrame mainFrame,
                                   java.net.URL modelURL,
                                   java.net.URL layoutURL)
                            throws IllegalActionException,
                                   NameDuplicationException,
                                   java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Open a model and an existing layout on the given frame. The information from both will be merged into one model that is returned.
        Parameters:
        mainFrame - The frame containing the contents infrastructure and the visual representations.
        modelURL - The url to the original Ptolemy II model file to use.
        layoutURL - The url to the layout file associated with the Ptolemy II model.
        Returns:
        A model that has the merged information from both the model and the layout.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If the model cannot be merged with the layout.
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - If cloning of the Ptolemy II model is not supported.
        NameDuplicationException - If there is a name duplication when merging the model and the layout.

      • parseModel

        public static void parseModel(HomerMainFrame mainFrame)
                       throws IllegalActionException,
                              NameDuplicationException
        Given a frame containing a model, this method will parse the model and populate the contents defined in the frame.
        Parameters:
        mainFrame - The frame containing the model to be parsed and the underlying contents infrastructure.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If the parsing fails.
        NameDuplicationException - If during the parsing a name duplication is found.

      • openModelFile

        public static CompositeEntity openModelFile(java.net.URL url)
                                     throws IllegalActionException
        Open a MoML file, parse it, and return the parsed model.
        Parameters:
        url - The url of the model.
        Returns:
        The parsed model.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If the parsing failed.

      • saveAs

        public static void saveAs(HomerMainFrame mainFrame,
                          java.io.File layoutFile)
        Save a layout to a MoML file. The layout file should contain all the information needed to create visual representations of elements and to communicate remotely.
        Parameters:
        mainFrame - The object containing all the information about the elements to create the layout file, such as position information.
        layoutFile - The file the layout is saved to.

      • getLocationToken

        public static IntMatrixToken getLocationToken(org.netbeans.api.visual.widget.Widget widget)
        Get the location from a widget in the form of an IntMatrixToken.
        Parameters:
        widget - The widget from where to extract the location from.
        Returns:
        The IntMatrixToken representing the location of the widget.

      • isSinkOrSource

        public static LayoutFileOperations.SinkOrSource isSinkOrSource(ComponentEntity entity)
        Check if the entity is a sink or source. It checks based on the ports of connected relations.
        Parameters:
        entity - The Ptolemy entity to check.
        Returns:
        SinkOrSource enumeration indicating whether the entity is a sink, a source, both, or none.
